emailform.title: Send Email
emailform.intro: Here you can send your email to the requested person or team or function
emailform.invalid: The Link is wrong or outdated. Please get a new link.
emailform.subject: Subject

contactform.title: Send Email
contactform.intro: Our web site is free from any privacy related functionality. No cookies nor external embedded content nor tracking. For the contact form we expect you to provide your email address first. We are looking forward to hear from you!
contactform.who_to_contact: Who do you want to contact?
contactform.check_your_email: We have sent an email containing the link to the contact form to you. Please check your Inbox and maybe your Spam folder.
